YOU SPIN MY HAIR RIGHT ROUND
R o t a t i n g
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
I'm a little cog, short and round
Just a cog in the machine
descriptionMsg: A special lil bot made by a special lil Nindroid :3

welcome.title: Thanks for adding Cogworks Bot!
welcome.description:
**Cogworks Bot** is a comprehensive Discord management bot with ticketing, applications, announcements, and more!

To get started, use the `/bot-setup` command to configure the bot for your server.

features.title: Features
features.value:
- **Ticketing System** - Organized support tickets with categories
- **Application System** - Job/role applications with custom positions
- **Announcements** - Beautiful announcement templates
- **Bait Channel** - Anti-bot/scammer protection
- **Role Management** - Easy role assignment commands

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.value:
1. Run `/bot-setup` to configure your server
2. Set up systems you need (tickets, applications, etc.)
3. Customize settings for each system
4. You're ready to go!

commands.title: Commands
commands.value:
- `/bot-setup` - Complete bot configuration wizard
- `/ticket-setup` - Set up ticket system
- `/application-setup` - Set up application system
- `/announcement-setup` - Set up announcements
- `/baitchannel setup` - Set up anti-bot protection
- `/data-export` - Export your server data (GDPR)

privacy.title: Privacy & Terms
privacy.value:
- [Privacy Policy](https://github.com/NindroidA/cogworks-bot/blob/main/docs/privacy_policy.md)
- [Terms of Service](https://github.com/NindroidA/cogworks-bot/blob/main/docs/terms_of_service.md)
- We only store data necessary for bot functionality
- Data is deleted when the bot leaves your server

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.value:
Join our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/cogworks) for:
- Setup assistance
- Feature requests
- Bug reports
- General questions

coffee.title: Support Cogworks
coffee.description: If you enjoy using Cogworks, consider buying me a coffee! Your support helps keep the bot running and development active.
